member.name: IPropertyStoreCache.GetState
member.summary: Gets the state of a specified property key.
member.param: A pointer to a enumeration value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyStoreCache.GetValueAndState
member.summary: Gets value and state data for a property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure identifying the property.
A pointer to a structure for the property data.
A pointer to a enumeration value declaring the current state of the property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyStoreCache.SetValueAndState
member.summary: Sets value and state data for a property key.
member.param: A reference to a structure identifying the property.
A pointer to a structure containing the property data.
A value from the enumeration declaring the state of the property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyStoreCache
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow a handler to manage various states for each property.
